titleStmt.title: In Swan-Ally in the Minories, lives a doctor of great experience, (Who by Gods blessing) hath admirable success in the cure of all diseases incident to the bodies of men, women, and children.

notesStmt.note: At end of text: "His hours are from 8 in the morning to 4 in the afternoon. You may know the doctors house by the white pales before the door."
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
